BodyAsJson.notes: [bool 0/1] If enabled the ''Manage Visits'' button will show in the Site User Menu on handheld. Site users are able to activate subject forms on the handheld.
[bool 0/1] If ''1'' the app will autosave the SiteBased DiaryEntry as the user answers each question.
Base version
[int 0-100] Percentage of battery level when a user will not be able to access the diary until the battery has been sufficiently charged.
This determines if the study has bring your own device functionality.
[bool 0/1] If ''1'' caregivers will have the ability to take patient questionnaires, if ''0'' caregivers will have the ability to take caregiver questionnaires.
[bool 0/1] If ''1'' users with the proper access will be able to access the ''Manage Caregiver'' button displayed on relevant screens.
Delimiter for grid csv exports
This is a flag to turn on subject handheld forms to be chained together.1 indicates that it is enabled.
This is the number in minutes when the handheld device will attempt to sync to the server. 0 indicates that it is disabled.
This is the number in minutes when the sitebased device will attempt to sync to the server. 0 indicates that it is disabled.

List of thresholds for Depot Lot Expiration Alert.  The threshold list represents when the alert should trigger, in days.  For example, 180,120,0 would fire the alert once at 180, once at 120, and once at 0.  Add as many threshold triggers as you like, separated by comma.
This indicates the time in minutes before a Handheld eCOA device will timeout.
This indicates the time in minutes before a Site Based eCOA device will timeout.
Type of drug order acknowledgement, can be Simple, Detailed, or TempTail
Use this key to prepend anything to the email subject line. Key is required.
Format for date used throughout the system
The value, if meet or exceeded, for which the randomization page will display a error message and not allow any further randomizations.
The value, if meet or exceeded, for which the screening page (either with or without IC) will display a error message and not allow any further screenings
[bool 0/1] This flag will tell the app whether or not to force the user to complete visit''s in order. This can be overriden at the Visit level using the AvailableAlways flag in the Visit table.
Place initial order after site activation
The PatientStatusTypeID that fires the initial drug order once a subject at that site is in this status.  ONLY used when "InitialOnSiteActivation" != "true"
Enable or Disables the email pdf attachement for confirmations.
This flag is used to set the stylings for web diary

BodyAsJson.key: Low Depot Inventory Alert Interval Days
BodyAsJson.notes: The interval, in days, the system will send a Low Depot Inventory Alert when the threshold is crossed.  For example, a value of 7 will send the low depot inventory alert every 7 days while the threshold value is crossed.  Used in conjunction with Low Depot Inventory Alert Threshold

The threshold, in kit count, that will trigger a low depot inventory alert.  The inventory level has to been below the threshold, and will be sent based on the Low Depot Inventory Alert Interval Days value.

The interval, in days, the system will send a Low Site Inventory Alert when the threshold is crossed.  For example, a value of 7 will send the low site inventory alert every 7 days while the threshold value is crossed.  Used in conjunction with Low Site Inventory Alert Threshold

The threshold, in kit count, that will trigger a low site inventory alert.  The inventory level has to been below the threshold, and will be sent based on the Low Site Inventory Alert Interval Days value.
The maximum number of logins a subject can fail before being locked out of the system.
Number of decimal places to allow when entering shipper temperature details

List of thresholds for Overdue Shipments.  The threshold list represents when the alert should trigger, in days.  For example, 5,7,9 would fire the alert once at 5 days, once at 7 days, and once at 9 days.  Add as many threshold triggers as you like, separated by comma.
This is a flag to turn on Change Status screen when disassociating patients on handhelds.1 indicates that it is enabled.
This is a flag to turn on Change Status option from the subject management page on tablets. 1 indicates that it is enabled.
[bool 0/1] When creating a new subject/patient number this value indicates whether the site id will be included.
true if subject number should be generated based on subject count in study, false if count should be at site level
Control the overall format of Subject number.
[string] When creating a new subject/patient number this value will be placed at the beginning of the number. (ie. "S" + SiteNumber + SubjectNumber)
[string] When creating a new subject/patient number this value will be used as a seperator between the prefix and the site id. (ie. Seperator is "-": S + "-" SiteNumber + SubjectNumber)
[string] When creating a new subject/patient number this value will be used as a seperator between the site id and the subject number. (ie. Seperator is "*": S + SiteNumber + "*" + SubjectNumber)
This determines the number of digits for the Patient PIN. This value can be set to 4 or 6.
Controls starting patient number
Questionnaire Id for patient compliance view
Question identification to be used by randomization
[bool 0/1] If ''1'' users with the proper access will be able to access the ''Setup Subject'' button displayed on relevant screens.
[bool 0/1] If ''1'' users with the proper access will be able to access the ''Create Subject'' button displayed on relevant screens.
[0 = no, 1 = yes] This shows the calculation details on the site based tablet.
If "true" app will ask for a missed visit date after a user closes a visit.
If "true" app will ask for a missed visit reason after a user closes a visit.
[bool 0/1] If ''1'' questionnaires will show current progress when being completed.
Show the temperature excursion question on simple order acknowledgment
This is a flag to display the Site Number in the header.1 indicates that it is enabled.
[bool 0/1] If ''1'' questionnaires will show current visit progress when being completed.

List of thresholds for Site Lot Expiration Alert.  The threshold list represents when the alert should trigger, in days.  For example, 180,120,0 would fire the alert once at 180, once at 120, and once at 0.  Add as many threshold triggers as you like, separated by comma.
Site number length
ID for the study matching the Study table in auth db
This is the clinical indication of the study (IE: Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder)
This is the clinical phase of the study
This is the clinical therapeutic area of the study (IE: Neurology)
Type of Study. Refer to StudyType Table
This determines the visibility of the Support chat button
The url of the Support chat service
Patients with projected visits between today and today + interval days are included on the widget.
Enter number of days Web Backup link is available for subject.  If ZERO, Web Backup for subject is not available.
The public key for the eCOA handheld Build published to Appetize. Will get merged into the URL.
Enter number of days to enable Web backupZero =  DISABLED, Any positive number = ENABLED
The public key for the eCOA tablet Build published to Appetize. Will get merged into the URL.
